comments.html: Try to apply "Skeptic's checklist" to Cisco's article "IPv6: The Five Stages of Grief", and see some interesting results..  :-P

comments.html: The only thing it spells out is GLIT. You can take it with a pinch of salt like the statement, "Everything that GLITters is not gold".  :-D
